verses.verse: And Abram <S%H87><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> he, <S%H1931><s%> and his wife, <S%H802><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he had, and Lot <S%H3876><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, into the south. <S%H5045><s%>
And Abram <S%H87><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> rich <S%H3515><s%> in cattle, <S%H4735><s%> in silver, <S%H3701><s%> and in gold. <S%H2091><s%>

And he went <S%H1980><s%> on his journeys <S%H4550><s%> from the south <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5045><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> had been <S%H1961><s%> at the beginning, <S%H8462><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Bethel <S%H1008><s%> and Hai; <S%H5857><s%>

Unto <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had made <S%H6213><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> at the first: <S%H7223><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And Lot <S%H3876><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> which went <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H854><s%> Abram, <S%H87><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and herds, <S%H1241><s%> and tents. <S%H168><s%>

And the land <S%H776><s%> was not <S%H3808><s%> able to bear <S%H5375><s%> them, that they might dwell <S%H3427><s%> together: <S%H3162><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> their substance <S%H7399><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> great, <S%H7227><s%> so that they could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>

And there was <S%H1961><s%> a strife <S%H7379><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the herdsmen <S%H7462><s%> of Abram's <S%H87><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%> and the herdsmen <S%H7462><s%> of Lot's <S%H3876><s%> cattle: <S%H4735><s%> and the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> then <S%H227><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

And Abram <S%H87><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Lot, <S%H3876><s%> Let there be <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H408><s%> strife, <S%H4808><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and thee, and between <S%H996><s%> my herdsmen <S%H7462><s%> and thy herdsmen; <S%H7462><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> we <S%H587><s%> be brethren. <S%H251><s%>

Is not <S%H3808><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee? separate thyself, <S%H6504><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> me: if <S%H518><s%> thou wilt take the left hand, <S%H8040><s%> then I will go to the right; <S%H3231><s%> or if <S%H518><s%> thou depart to the right hand, <S%H3225><s%> then I will go to the left. <S%H8041><s%>

And Lot <S%H3876><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and beheld <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the plain <S%H3603><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> it was well watered <S%H4945><s%> every where, <S%H3605><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> destroyed <S%H7843><s%> <S%H853><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> even as the garden <S%H1588><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> like the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> as thou comest <S%H935><s%> unto Zoar. <S%H6820><s%>

Then Lot <S%H3876><s%> chose <S%H977><s%> him <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the plain <S%H3603><s%> of Jordan; <S%H3383><s%> and Lot <S%H3876><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> east: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6924><s%> and they separated themselves <S%H6504><s%> the one <S%H376><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the other. <S%H251><s%>

Abram <S%H87><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and Lot <S%H3876><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the plain, <S%H3603><s%> and pitched his tent <S%H167><s%> toward <S%H5704><s%> Sodom. <S%H5467><s%>
But the men <S%H376><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> were wicked <S%H7451><s%> and sinners <S%H2400><s%> before the LORD <S%H3068><s%> exceedingly. <S%H3966><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Abram, <S%H87><s%> after that <S%H310><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%> was separated <S%H6504><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> him, Lift up <S%H5375><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> thine eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and look <S%H7200><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art northward, <S%H6828><s%> and southward, <S%H5045><s%> and eastward, <S%H6924><s%> and westward: <S%H3220><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> seest, <S%H7200><s%> to thee will I give <S%H5414><s%> it, and to thy seed <S%H2233><s%> forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

And I will make <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy seed <S%H2233><s%> as the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%> so that <S%H834><s%> if <S%H518><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> can <S%H3201><s%> number <S%H4487><s%> <S%H853><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> then shall thy seed <S%H2233><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> be numbered. <S%H4487><s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> in the length <S%H753><s%> of it and in the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of it; for <S%H3588><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> it unto thee.

Then Abram <S%H87><s%> removed his tent, <S%H167><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the plain <S%H436><s%> of Mamre, <S%H4471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
